snippet.title: Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure -- Chapter 26: Dragon's Peak
snippet.description:
Read the description!

***
Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure [Wii] playthrough, with commentary
Chapter 26
Dragon's Peak

The Adventure Packs contain a new area (additional chapter) in the game, a Skylander, and two Magic Items. Dragon's Peak contains Sunburn, Sparx the Dragonfly, and the Winged Boots.

Vathek has seized the throne of Dragon's Peak, becoming its new king. Your task is to assist Flavius and Ramses in kicking Vathek and his forces out.

This is the fourth and final Adventure Pack, and the last chapter of the game. But after this, we still have plenty of content left to go through, including the Heroic Challenges!

Enjoy!

Subscribe for more Skylanders videos!
http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=octaneblue

Check out the Skylanders: Spyro's Advenure playlist:
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0A1271BD80F881C0

"Like" me on Facebook
http://www.facebook.com/octanebluetube

Follow me on Twitter
http://www.twitter.com/octaneblue
 
***
Credits: 
Intro animation by Jesse (http://www.youtube.com/Charizard215)
Ending art by James C. (http://www.youtube.com/dembonez19)

Developer: Toys for Bob
Publisher: Activision
System: Wii

Recorded with the Hauppauge HD PVR.
